name: Bugazor
description:
In a world where the bugs are trapped under the claws of the evil electronic devices, you play as the saviour that will free them all.

May the bugs be with you...

Credits

Solo game dev: Programming, 3d Modelling, & Game Design: @adoankim

Software: Unity3d and Blender

Link to Github repository: Bugazor

  • Background is from wallpaperflare
  • Bug sprites were made with creature mixer from Kenney
  • Music pack "NES shooter music 5 tracks 3 jingles" from SketchyLogic
  • Laser sound from sci-fi-sounds pack by Kenney
  • Other sound effects made with Ableton Live 11. Reused from previous games: Piece of mind, Dog wants threat and Startcat vs the froggos empire

Developer note: This is my first gameoff, so be nice please :D!

Developer note 2: There is a secret "game bug" hidden.
